## LightModel.calculateNormal() method

Calculate the normal vector for current fragment

**Signature:**

```typescript
calculateNormal(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, worldPosition: PBShaderExp, worldNormal?: PBShaderExp, worldTangent?: PBShaderExp, worldBinormal?: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | The shader scope |
|  worldPosition | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | World space position of current fragment |
|  worldNormal | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | _(Optional)_ World space normal of current fragment |
|  worldTangent | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | _(Optional)_ World space tangent of current fragment |
|  worldBinormal | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | _(Optional)_ World space binormal of current fragment |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

Normal vector for current fragment
